version 1.0\nRide Share is a free and open source android carpooling app which allows to share rides to passengers
Here are some general rules for both riders and passengers in a carpooling app:\n
For Riders:
1. Be Punctual: Respect the time of your riders and fellow passengers by being ready on time for pick-up.
2. Communicate: Keep lines of communication open with your driver. Inform them if you are running late or need to cancel.
3. Respect the Vehicle: Treat the car as if it were your own. Avoid leaving trash behind and be mindful of cleanliness.
4. Be Considerate: Be mindful of your fellow passengers. Avoid behaviors that may make them uncomfortable, such as playing loud music or eating strong-smelling foods.
5. Follow Safety Guidelines: Wear your seatbelt at all times and adhere to any other safety guidelines provided by the driver.
6. Respect Personal Boundaries: Respect the driver personal space and avoid engaging in inappropriate conversations or behaviors.
7. Feedback: Provide constructive feedback to the carpooling app about your experience to help maintain quality service.
\nFor Passengers:
1. Safety First: Only pick up and drop off passengers in safe and designated areas.
2. Clear Communication: Communicate clearly with your riders regarding pick-up and drop-off locations, as well as any other relevant details.
3. Follow the Route: Stick to the agreed-upon route unless there is a need for a detour. Avoid deviating from the route without the agreement of all passengers.
4. Respect Privacy: Respect the privacy of your passengers and avoid engaging in overly personal conversations unless initiated by them.
5. Maintain a Clean Vehicle: Keep your vehicle clean and well-maintained for the comfort of your passengers.
6. Safety Equipment: Ensure that your vehicle is equipped with necessary safety features and that all passengers wear seatbelts during the journey.
7. Be Professional: Maintain a professional demeanor and provide a pleasant experience for your passengers.
8. Feedback: Encourage passengers to provide feedback on their experience, and use this feedback to improve your service.
\nBy following these rules, both riders and passengers can contribute to a safe, comfortable, and enjoyable carpooling experience.
